Trade/Device Name(s): Thermo Scientific QMS® TDM Multi-Constituent Calibrator
Submitter Information: Thermo Fisher Scientific, Clinical Diagnostics Division
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Abbott and Thermo Scientific TDM Multiconstituent Calibrator for calibration of multiple therapeutic drug monitoring assays in serum/plasma.
Indications for Use Summary: For in vitro diagnostic calibration of assays for Amikacin, Carbamazepine, Digoxin, Gentamicin, Phenobarbital, Phenytoin, Quinidine, Theophylline, Valproic Acid, and Vancomycin in human serum and plasma on ARCHITECT cSystems and clinical laboratory analyzers.
